description: Fix some local path validation issues (`issue 1575 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1575>`__)

Fix ``--tape-ar-ns``, ``--volume-ar-ns``, and ``--vtl-device-ar-ns`` to ``--tape-arns``, ``--volume-arns``, and ``--vtl-device-arns``, respectively.  The old arguments are still supported for backwards compatibility, but are no longer documented. (`issue 1599 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1599>`__)
Fix an issue when creating a new S3 bucket (`issue 1593 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1593>`__)
